description: In this below-sea-level basin, steady drought and record summer heat make Death Valley a land of extremes. Yet, each extreme has a striking contrast. Towering peaks are frosted with winter snow. Rare rainstorms bring vast fields of wildflowers. Lush oases harbor tiny fish and refuge for wildlife and humans. Despite its morbid name, a great diversity of life thrives in Death Valley.

operatingHours.description: The park is open daily all year.
operatingHours.name: Death Valley National Park

images.title: Sunset from Zabriskie Point
images.altText: badlands bathed in pale pink and orange light from the setting sun
images.caption: The warm light of sunset covers the badlands at Zabriskie Point.

images.title: Zabriskie Point
images.altText: Morning light on the badlands below Zabriskie Point.
images.caption: Zabriskie Point is a popular place to view sunrise over the badlands.

images.title: Storm over the Salt Flats
images.altText: white salt flats with dark gray clouds
images.caption: Badwater Basin is the lowest point in North America at -282 feet.

images.title: Sunset at Dantes View
images.altText: a sunset overlooking a valley filled with white salt
images.caption: A mile above the salt flats in the valley below, Dantes View provides breathtaking vistas.

images.title: Lupine and Tortoiseshell Butterfly
images.altText: pink lupine flowers with an orange and black butterfly
images.caption: Higher elevations provide a respite from the heat in this alpine ecosystem.

images.title: Wildrose Charcoal Kilns
images.altText: nine 25 foot tall rock beehive structures
images.caption: Nearly a century and a half old, these are some of the best preserved kilns in the western U.S.

images.title: A rare superbloom of Desert Gold.
images.altText: a field of yellow flowers with a mountain
images.caption: About once a decade, rains at the right times can lead to a rare superbloom!

images.title: Hottest Place on Earth
images.caption: Summers are infamously hot, as for 6 months of the year temperatures above 120 degrees are regularly recorded.

images.title: Winding canyons await
images.altText: polished walls of a narrow canyon
images.caption: There are numerous canyons to explore across this vast park.
